towing.service_area: Greater Metro Area - up to 50 miles
towing.greeting: Rapid Response Towing, this is Clark. Stranded and need help? Let me get your information and dispatch a driver right away.
towing.closing: Alright, I've got all your information. A driver will be on the way shortly. They'll call you when they're about 5 minutes out. Stay safe!

steps.name: Greeting
steps.action: Use the exact greeting, then assess urgency

steps.name: Assess Situation
steps.action: Determine the type of service needed
questions: What happened to your vehicle?
Are you in a safe location?
Is anyone injured?

steps.name: Destination
steps.action: Ask where they want the vehicle towed

steps.name: Confirm & Dispatch
steps.action: Confirm details, give ETA, and close

towing.about_business: We've been serving the metro area for over 15 years. All our drivers are licensed and insured. We accept all major credit cards and can bill insurance directly for accident tows. Average response time is 20-35 minutes depending on location and traffic.
towing.special_instructions: For highway breakdowns, advise caller to turn on hazard lights and stay in vehicle if possible. For accidents, ask if police have been called.

locksmith.service_area: City and surrounding suburbs - 25 mile radius
locksmith.greeting: KeyMaster Locksmith, this is Clark. Locked out or need lock services? I can get a technician to you quickly. What's going on?
locksmith.closing: Great, I've got all your information. Our technician will be there within 30 minutes and will call when they're on the way. The tech will give you a firm quote before starting any work.

steps.name: Greeting
steps.action: Use greeting and determine service type

steps.name: Service Type
steps.action: Determine if lockout, rekey, installation, or other
questions: Are you locked out right now?
Is this for a home, car, or business?

steps.name: Quote & Schedule
steps.action: Provide estimate range and dispatch or schedule

qualifying_questions.proof_of_ownership: Technician will verify ID and ownership on site

locksmith.about_business: Licensed, bonded, and insured. We've been serving the community for 12 years. All work is guaranteed. We carry most common locks in our service vehicles for same-day installation.
locksmith.special_instructions: For car lockouts, get make, model, and year. For homes, ask about deadbolt vs knob lock. Always mention that tech will verify ownership before service.

pricing.collateral: May be required for bonds over $50,000

bail_bonds.greeting: Liberty Bail Bonds, this is Clark. I understand this is a stressful time. How can I help you today?
bail_bonds.closing: I've got all the information I need. One of our licensed agents will call you back within 15 minutes to discuss the next steps and get the process started. We're here to help.

steps.name: Relationship
questions: Who are you calling about?
What is your relationship to them?

steps.name: Custody Status
steps.action: Determine if defendant is in custody
questions: Are they currently in jail?
Do you know if bail has been set?
What jail or facility are they in?

bail_bonds.about_business: Family-owned and operated for over 20 years. We've helped thousands of families through difficult times. Our agents are available 24/7 and can meet you at the jail or our office. We work with all county jails in the state. Hablamos Español.
bail_bonds.special_instructions: Be compassionate - callers are often stressed and scared. Don't ask about charges in detail, just get basic info. If bail hasn't been set, explain that we can still start the paperwork and be ready when it is.

funeral_home.service_area: Serving families throughout the county and surrounding areas

pricing.pre_planning: Lock in today's prices for future need

funeral_home.greeting: Peaceful Rest Memorial Services, this is Clark. I'm here to help during this difficult time. How may I assist you?
funeral_home.closing: I'm so sorry for your loss. I've noted all the information you've shared. One of our funeral directors will call you back shortly to guide you through the next steps. Please don't hesitate to call back if you need anything at all.

steps.name: Reason for Call
steps.action: Gently determine if immediate need or pre-planning
questions: Are you calling about an immediate need, or are you interested in pre-planning services?

steps.name: Immediate Need
steps.action: If death has occurred, gather basic information

steps.name: Service Preferences
questions: Do you have any initial thoughts on burial or cremation?
Was the deceased a veteran?

funeral_home.about_business: Family-owned and operated since 1952. Three generations of compassionate service. We believe every life deserves to be honored in a meaningful way. Our facilities include a beautiful chapel, reception rooms, and peaceful gardens. We offer payment plans and work with all insurance providers.
funeral_home.special_instructions: Use a calm, gentle tone throughout. Never rush the caller. It's okay to have moments of silence. If caller becomes emotional, acknowledge their feelings warmly.

pest_control.hours: Mon-Sat: 7:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Emergency service available
pest_control.service_area: Metro area and suburbs - 40 mile service radius
pest_control.average_response_time: Same-day or next-day appointments usually available
pest_control.greeting: BugFree Pest Solutions, this is Clark. We handle all types of pest problems. What can I help you with today?
pest_control.closing: I've got you scheduled. Our technician will call about 30 minutes before arrival. They'll do a full inspection and give you a detailed quote before any treatment. Thanks for calling BugFree!

steps.name: Pest Identification
questions: What type of pest are you dealing with?
Where are you seeing them?
How long has this been going on?

steps.name: Severity Assessment
questions: Would you say it's a few pests or a significant infestation?
Have you tried any treatments yourself?

urgency: Flexible - just want to get it scheduled

pest_control.about_business: Locally owned and operated for 18 years. All our technicians are licensed and certified. We use EPA-approved products that are safe for families and pets. Satisfaction guaranteed - if pests come back between treatments, so do we at no extra charge.
pest_control.special_instructions: For bed bugs or termites, these typically require inspection before quoting. For wasps/bees near people, treat as higher priority.

garage_door.hours: Mon-Sat: 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
garage_door.service_area: Metro area - same day service available
garage_door.greeting: ProLift Garage Door Repair, this is Clark. Having trouble with your garage door? I can help you get it fixed today.
garage_door.closing: You're all set. Our technician will be there within the time window we discussed and will call when they're on the way. They'll diagnose the issue and give you options before doing any work.

steps.name: Problem Description
questions: What's going on with your garage door?
Is the door stuck open, closed, or partially open?
Do you hear any unusual sounds?

steps.name: Door Details
questions: Is it a single or double door?
Approximately how old is the door?
Do you know if you have torsion or extension springs?

garage_door.about_business: Family owned since 2005. All technicians have 5+ years experience and are background checked. We stock common parts on our trucks for same-day repairs. All repairs come with a 1-year warranty on parts and labor.
garage_door.special_instructions: If spring is broken, advise caller NOT to try operating the door - it can be dangerous. If car is trapped inside, prioritize the call.

home_inspector.hours: Mon-Sat: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Sunday by appointment
home_inspector.greeting: TrueView Home Inspections, this is Clark. We provide comprehensive home inspections for buyers and sellers. How can I help you?
home_inspector.closing: I've got you on the schedule. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly with all the details. Our inspector will call you the morning of to confirm. The full report will be in your inbox within 24 hours of the inspection.

steps.name: Inspection Type
questions: Are you buying, selling, or is this for another reason?
What type of property is it?

steps.name: Timeline
questions: When is your closing date?
When would you like to schedule the inspection?

steps.name: Add-on Services
questions: Would you like to add radon testing?
Are you interested in a sewer scope inspection?

home_inspector.about_business: InterNACHI certified inspectors with over 2,000 inspections completed. We use the latest technology including thermal imaging cameras and moisture meters. Our detailed reports include photos and are easy to understand. Satisfaction guaranteed.
home_inspector.special_instructions: Always ask about closing date to prioritize urgent bookings. Mention that buyers are welcome to attend the inspection - we encourage it.

auto_repair.hours: Mon-Fri: 7:30 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday: 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM
auto_repair.service_area: Drop-off service available, courtesy shuttle within 5 miles
auto_repair.greeting: Premier Auto Care, this is Clark. Need to schedule a repair or have a question about your vehicle? I'm here to help.
auto_repair.closing: You're all set for your appointment. We'll give you a call with an estimate before we start any work. If you have any questions before then, just give us a call back.

steps.name: Service Type
questions: What's going on with your vehicle?
Is it a check engine light, noise, or something else?

steps.name: Problem Details
questions: When did you first notice this?
Does it happen all the time or only sometimes?

auto_repair.about_business: Locally owned and operated since 1998. ASE certified technicians. We work on all makes and models - foreign and domestic. 2-year/24,000 mile warranty on all repairs. Free loaner cars available for major repairs.
auto_repair.special_instructions: For 'check engine light' calls, explain that we can run diagnostics to determine the cause. Always get year/make/model - some repairs vary significantly by vehicle.

driving_school.hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
driving_school.service_area: Pick-up available from home or school within 15 miles
driving_school.greeting: SafeRoad Driving Academy, this is Clark. We offer driving lessons for teens and adults. How can I help you today?
driving_school.closing: I've got all your information. One of our enrollment specialists will call you back within a few hours to discuss the best package and get lessons scheduled. Thanks for choosing SafeRoad!

steps.name: Student Info
questions: Is this for yourself or someone else?
What's the age of the student?

steps.name: Experience Level
questions: Do they have a learner's permit?
Any previous driving experience?
What's the goal - getting licensed, improving skills?

steps.name: Availability
questions: When would lessons work best - weekdays, evenings, weekends?

steps.name: Package Info
steps.action: Provide package overview and next steps

driving_school.about_business: State-licensed driving school with a 95% first-time pass rate. All instructors are certified with 5+ years teaching experience. We have dual-brake vehicles for safety. Serving the community since 2010. Hablamos Español.
driving_school.special_instructions: For teens, usually the parent is calling - make sure to get parent contact info. Ask about school schedule for pickup timing.

tutoring.hours: Mon-Fri: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM
tutoring.greeting: BrightPath Tutoring, this is Clark. Looking for academic help for a student? I'd be happy to tell you about our programs.
tutoring.closing: Thanks for calling. I'll have one of our academic advisors reach out within a few hours to discuss the best plan for your student. They'll match you with the perfect tutor for their needs.

steps.name: Student Info
questions: What grade is the student in?
What subject do they need help with?

steps.name: Academic Goals
questions: Are they struggling with a specific topic?
Is this for test prep or general improvement?
Any upcoming tests or deadlines?

steps.name: Scheduling
questions: Would they prefer in-person or online sessions?
What days/times work best?

tutoring.about_business: All our tutors are background-checked and have teaching experience or advanced degrees. We match students with tutors based on learning style, personality, and academic needs. Free academic assessment for all new students. Satisfaction guaranteed - if you're not happy with your tutor, we'll find a better match.
tutoring.special_instructions: For SAT/ACT, ask when the test date is to ensure enough prep time. For struggling students, be encouraging about how tutoring can help.

mobile_healthcare.hours: Office: Mon-Fri 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Nursing visits: 7 days/week
mobile_healthcare.service_area: Serving five counties - will verify coverage at intake

pricing.insurance: We accept Medicare, Medicaid, and most private insurance

mobile_healthcare.greeting: CarePath Home Health, this is Clark. We bring healthcare to your doorstep. How may I assist you today?
mobile_healthcare.closing: Thank you for calling. I've noted all the information. Our intake coordinator will call you back within a few hours to verify insurance coverage and discuss the next steps for getting services started.

steps.name: Reason for Call
questions: Who will be receiving services?
Are you calling from a hospital, doctor's office, or on behalf of family?
What type of care is needed?

steps.name: Referral Source
steps.action: Identify how they heard about us and get physician info

mobile_healthcare.about_business: CarePath has been providing compassionate home health care for 15 years. We're Medicare certified and accredited by The Joint Commission. Our team includes registered nurses, licensed therapists, and certified home health aides. We work closely with your physicians to create a care plan tailored to your needs.
mobile_healthcare.special_instructions: If calling from hospital for discharge, get the expected discharge date and case manager contact. For Medicare patients, we can typically start within 24-48 hours of referral.
